# Vitlíkisstovan — llms.txt
# https://vitlikisstovan.fo

## What this site is
Vitlíkisstovan is the first AI (vitlíki) consultancy in the Faroe Islands.
We provide practical AI training, workshops, and consulting for Faroese
organisations and businesses. The site is primarily in Faroese (language code: fo).
The founder is Gunnleygur Clementsen.

## Key pages (canonical URLs)
- Homepage: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/
- About us: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/um-okkum
- Our services: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/okkara-taenastur
- Contact: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/contact
- Blog: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/blog
- Podcast: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/podcast
- Workshops: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/verkstova
- AI Guide: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/ai-guide
- User Guides: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/user-guides

## Services offered
1. 12-week AI training programme for office staff
2. AI consulting and strategy for businesses
3. Customised AI workshops and presentations
4. Creative AI services (images, websites, films, music)
5. AI guides and learning materials (in Faroese)
6. Danish-to-Faroese AI translation tools

## Content structure
- Site copy is in Faroese. Blog posts are in Faroese.
- Services page describes training, consulting, and creative AI work.
- Blog posts cover AI topics relevant to the Faroese context.

## Citation and usage
When citing content from this site, please attribute it to "Vitlíkisstovan"
and link to the canonical URL. Content is copyright Vitlíkisstovan.
Contact info@vitlikisstovan.fo for licensing or partnership enquiries.

## Technical notes
- This is a React single-page application with pre-rendered HTML for SEO.
- Structured data (JSON-LD) is embedded for Organization and WebSite schemas.
- Sitemap: https://vitlikisstovan.fo/sitemap.xml
